long_description: Pull on the REI Metaline Quarter-Zip fleece top to take the chill out of an evening stroll around town or a hike on a breezy hillside. Breathable, quick-drying polyester fleece offers warmth without a lot of weight, so you stay comfortable. Brushed polyester tricot fabric lines the neck for comfort next to skin. Zippered chest pocket. Relaxed fit of the REI Metaline Quarter-Zip fleece top allows for comfort and freedom of movement.
short_description: Pull on the REI Metaline Quarter-Zip fleece top to take the chill out of an evening stroll around town or a hike on a breezy hillside.
